posts.post_content:
Dear Card Community:

This is my first post.  I am looking for a 1965 J.D. McCarthy Postcard of my favorite player, Bert Campaneris.

If you have one that you would be willing to move or if anyone knows someone that might, please let me know.

My email is [url]coachrickfrank@gamil.com[/url]

Thank you all so much and I look forward to getting to know you all better.

Rick

[quote name="Coach Rick Frank" post=2457210]Dear Card Community:

Hey Rick! I'm pretty sure I have one of these, but I'll have to look when I get off work. I'll shoot you a message this evening.
